items.sentence: How come you don't seem to care what happens?
Tom and Mary put on their Halloween costumes.
I don't have anybody to practice French with.
Did you say that you were going to Australia?
After you left, things didn't get any better.
Is it true that your boyfriend is a Canadian?
I'm not yet convinced that we should do that.
I've been having a lot of fun here in Boston.
I've been a lot busier than I expected to be.
Tom was arrested as he was leaving his house.
Tom wants to know why Mary wanted to do that.
Tom's father didn't know what to do with him.
Please don't put anything on top of that box.
The train was late because of the heavy snow.
I thought you wanted to learn how to do this.
This math problem isn't easy for me to solve.
That doesn't seem particularly logical to me.
Tom just stood there, envying the other boys.
I've been writing this manuscript for a year.
I think I'd better not say anything about it.
